name: MMOonshot
description:
Instructions

Explore the different levels of this platformer, solve the puzzles with your projectiles and your moon artifact.

  • Left click to shoot projectile
  • W or Q to move left
  • D to move right
  • Space to jump

Once you get the moon artifact you can also

  • Right click to spawn a moon artifact
  • Maintain right click to remove moon artifact
  • Right click to toggle moon artifact if spawned

Informations

Source is available here : https://github.com/Sygmei/Moonshot

The game is made with ÖbEngine

If there is a dll missing (such as VCRUNTIME140_1.dll), you should install the Microsoft Redistribuables here : https://aka.ms/vs/16/release/vc_redist.x64.exe

Game by

  • Sygmei : Dev, Game / Level / Sound design
  • Irio : Dev
  • Marion : Art / Animation
  • Rhodyn : Music

Special thanks

To the math task force for helping with lunar trajectories :)

  • Mimic
  • Guillaume
  • Erwan

and FEEL for the great pixel art easter egg

Bugfixes

[v08] Embedded VCRUNTIME104_1.dll with the game, fixed login button not working consistently
